inclusion.criterion: fibrosis (Fibroscan stiffness ≥10 kPa) or bioptic evaluation of cirrhosis within 6 months previously
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: extrahepatic manifestations of chronic hepatitis C virus infection
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy. No evidence of alcoholic liver disease, bleeding from esophageal varices, hemochromatosis, autoimmune hepatitis or metabolic liver disease.
